channel.title: Hi there! Glad to meet you. on ike.io
channel.description: Recent content in Hi there! Glad to meet you. on ike.io

item.title: When Despair Grows in Me
item.description: “When despair for the world grows in me and I wake in the night at the least sound in fear of what my life and my children’s lives may be, I go and lie down where the wood drake rests in his beauty on the water, and the great heron feeds. I come into the peace of wild things who do not tax their lives with forethought of grief. I come into the presence of still water.

item.title: Work Like a Slave
item.description: “Work like a slave; command like a king; create like a god.”
